trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality for a control to act as a parent for other controls.
trans-unit.target: 为某控件提供功能，使其用作其他控件的父级。

trans-unit.source: The following example inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>类并实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl>接口。

trans-unit.source: Implementation is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface in classes that you want to parent a collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: 你想要父控件的集合的类中实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: The members of this interface allow you to activate a child control, or determine which control is currently active.
trans-unit.target: 此接口的成员，可以激活子控件，或确定哪个控件是当前处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> takes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> as a parameter and activates the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 在类中实现时<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" />采用<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />作为参数并激活指定的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl" /> property activates or retrieves the control that is active.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl" />属性激活或检索处于活动状态的控件。

trans-unit.source: In most common scenarios, you do not need to directly implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，你不需要直接实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you create a Windows Control Library project, Visual Studio generates an initial class for you.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你创建 Windows 控件库项目，Visual Studio 将为你生成一个初始的类。

trans-unit.source: That class inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> class, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl" /> for you.
trans-unit.target: 类继承自<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" />类，和<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" />实现<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl" />为你。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> being activated.
trans-unit.target: 被激活的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Activates a specified control.
trans-unit.target: 激活指定的控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is successfully activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功激活了控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>类并实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl>接口。

trans-unit.source: Implementation is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, this method activates the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: 类中实现时，此方法将激活指定<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: The control must be a child of the container control.
trans-unit.target: 控件必须是容器控件的子级。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control that is active on the container control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该容器控件上的活动控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that is currently active on the container control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />，当前在容器控件上为活动的。

trans-unit.source: The following example inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>类并实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl>接口。

trans-unit.source: Implementation is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, this property activates or retrieves the active control on the container control.
trans-unit.target: 类中实现时，此属性将激活或检索的容器控件上的活动控件。
